SA10n1069:4: iha kaṃcit kāla viśeṣamapekṣya aṅkurotpattiḥ bhāvānāmutpādo bhavati,
SA10n1069:7: vidyamānāyāmapi hetupratyayasāmagryām - ityato vidyata eva kālaḥ,
SA10n1069:10: syāt saṃbhavavibhavanimittatā kālasya yadi saṃbhavavibhavāveva syātām |
SA10n1069:14: vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai |
SA10n1069:15: vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai ||1 ||
SA10n1069:21: tatra tāvad yathā vinā saṃbhavena utpādena vibhavo vināśo nāsti,
SA10n1069:23: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā |
SA10n1069:24: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā ||2 ||
SA10n1069:25: saṃbhavaṃ vinā kathaṃ nāma vibhavo vināśo bhaviṣyati?
SA10n1069:38: evaṃ tāvadvinā saṃbhavena vibhavo na yuktaḥ iti pratipādya idānīṃ saha saṃbhavenāpi vibhavo na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1069:40: na janmamaraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate ||3 ||
SA10n1069:41: yadi hi saṃbhavena saha yugapat tulyakālaṃ vibhavaḥ syāt,
SA10n1069:43: na caivaṃ parasparaviruddhe ālokāndhakāravadekasmin kāle vidyete iti |
SA10n1069:44: tasmāt sahāpi saṃbhavena vibhavasya nāsti siddhiriti sthitam ||3 ||
SA10n1069:45: yadā caivaṃ saṃbhavena vinā vā saha vā vibhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ,
SA10n1069:46: evaṃ saṃbhavasyāpi vinā vā saha vā vibhavena nāsti siddhiriti pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1069:47: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā
SA10n1069:48: anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācinna vidyate ||4 ||
SA10n1069:49: naiva hi saṃbhavo vibhavena vinā yujyate |
SA10n1069:50: yasmādanityatā hi bhāveṣu bhavanadharmakeṣu utpāda dharmakeṣu na kadācinna vidyate,
SA10n1069:51: kiṃ tarhi sarvadaiva vidyate | uktaṃ hi -
SA10n1069:53: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā || iti |
SA10n1069:55: tadā kutaḥ sā kācidavasthā yā vināśarahitā syāditi?
SA10n1069:56: ato nāsti vibhavena vinā utpāda iti |
SA10n1069:65: yadapi nirdiṣṭam- bhāvātmabhāva eva abhūtvā bhāvādutpāda ucyate,
SA10n1069:70: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye |
SA10n1069:71: kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ ||iti |
SA10n1069:80: api ca | kuto mādhyamikānāṃ svabhāvarūpaṃ siddhasattākaṃ yasya avasthāviśeṣa utpādaḥ syāt?
SA10n1069:86: yathā hi ayaṃ heturvināśasya nirhetukatvaṃ sādhayati,
SA10n1069:88: tathā saṃskāraskandhasaṃgrahapratītyasamutpādāṅga saṃgrahādikamapi sarvaṃ virodhayatīti na yuktametanmatam |
SA10n1069:95: idānīṃ vibhavena saha yathā saṃbhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ,
SA10n1069:98: na janmamaraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate ||5 ||
SA10n1069:99: yadi hi saṃbhavo vibhavenaiva saha syāt,
SA10n1069:103: atha syāt - yadyapi janmamaraṇayorekībhāvena vā nānābhāvena vā nāsti siddhiḥ,
SA10n1069:112: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate ||6 ||
SA10n1069:113: sahabhāvāsahabhāvarahitaṃ nāsti pakṣāntaraṃ yataḥ saṃbhavavibhavayoḥ siddhiḥ syāt |
SA10n1069:119: anirdhāryamāṇau svarūpatvāt bandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivanna staḥ eva saṃbhavavibhavāviti |
SA10n1069:122: kiṃ cānyat - ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpyamānau kṣayadharmiṇo vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātā makṣayadharmiṇo vā?
SA10n1069:125: kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca ||7 ||
SA10n1069:126: tatra kṣayasya kṣayalakṣaṇasya bhāvasya virodhidharmasadbhāvāt saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ |
SA10n1069:127: akṣayasyāpi bhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt kharaviṣāṇasyeva saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ |
SA10n1069:134: yau ca saṃbhavavibhavau na kṣayadharmiṇo nākṣayadharmiṇo bhāvasya saṃbhavataḥ,
SA10n1069:146: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate |
SA10n1069:148: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate ||8 ||
SA10n1069:150: tau ca svarūpato na staḥ iti pratiṣiddhau |
SA10n1069:152: tadā bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca vinā kuto bhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇo bhāvo bhaviṣyati?
SA10n1069:153: bhāvaṃ ca vinā na staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau ||
SA10n1069:154: apare tu pūrvārdhaṃ paścimaṃ kṛtvā vyācakṣate |
SA10n1069:165: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate |
SA10n1069:168: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate ||
SA10n1069:170: kiṃ cānyat - ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpamānau śūnyasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātā - maśūnyasya vā?
SA10n1069:176: kiṃ cānyat - iha yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām,
SA10n1069:177: tau ekatvena vā syātāmanyatvena vā/ ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha -
SA10n1069:187: āgopālāṅganādiko hi janaḥ yasmāt saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca paśyati,
SA10n1069:189: na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ śakyo draṣṭumiti | evamapi -
SA10n1069:192: na hi yad yad lokenopalabhyate tasya tasya astitvam |
SA10n1069:193: tathā hi āgopālāṅganādiko jano gandharvanagaramāyāsvapnālātacakramarīcikāsalilādikamavidyamāna mapi paśyati indriyopaghātāt,
SA10n1069:196: atha kasmāt punaretadevaṃ niścīyate - avidyamānasvarūpāvimau saṃbhavavibhavau mohādeva vāralokena dṛśyete iti |
SA10n1069:199: iha yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma bhavet,
SA10n1069:206: bhāvāt tāvat saṃbhavākhyād bhāvasya saṃbhavākhyasya utpādo na vidyate,
SA10n1069:214: yadi syāt, tadā vandhyāduhiturapi putraḥ syāt |
SA10n1069:232: athavā | ayamanyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ - iha hi yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām,
SA10n1069:234: tau ca bhāvābhāvau sarvathā vicāryamāṇau na saṃbhavataḥ |
SA10n1069:243: api ca | yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma syāt,
SA10n1069:245: na ca kaścid bhāvaḥ svarūpato'sti kharaviṣāṇavat svabhāvānutpannatvāt |
SA10n1069:248: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate |
SA10n1069:251: etacca ādya eva prakaraṇe vyākhyātattvānna punarvyākhyāyate |
SA10n1069:252: yaścaivaṃ yathoktaprakāreṇa jāyate sa idānīṃ kuto jāyate?
SA10n1069:254: avaśyaṃ caitadevamabhyupeyam - sarvathā nāsti bhāvasyotpāda iti ||13 ||
SA10n1069:255: bhāvasadbhāvatābhyupagame ca bhavataḥ śāśvatocchedadarśanamāpadyate bauddhamatānugasyetyāha - bhāvamabhyupapannasya śāśvatocchedadarśanam |
SA10n1069:258: sa bhāvo hi nityo'nityo'tha vā bhavet ||14 ||
SA10n1069:262: yasmāt sa bhāvaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ nityo vā bhavedanityo vā |
SA10n1069:281: sa eva saṃsāraḥ yo'yaṃ hetuphalāvicchinnakramavartī utpādavyayānuprabandhaḥ saṃskārāṇāmiti |
SA10n1069:287: yo hi hetukṣaṇaḥ phalasyotpattau hetubhāvamupetya nirudhyate ,
SA10n1069:289: tavāyaṃ kathaṃ na doṣa iti cet,
SA10n1069:294: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat |
SA10n1069:296: ityuktam, tatrāpi amunā nyāyena naiḥsvābhāvyameva bhāvānāṃ pratipāditam |
SA10n1069:297: anyathā hi sati bhāvasvarūpe bījāṅkurayoḥ kathamanyatvaṃ na syāt?
SA10n1069:299: evaṃ tāvad bhāvamabhyupapannasya hetoḥ punaranutpādāducchedadarśanaprasaṅgamudbhāvya idānīṃ śāśvatavāde doṣaprasaṅgamudbhāvayannāha -
SA10n1069:301: yadi hi hetoḥ sadbhāvaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt,
SA10n1069:302: tasya paścādasadbhāvo na syāt svabhāvasyā napāyitvāt |
SA10n1069:321: anayośca bhavayoḥ saṃsāra iti saṃjñā kṛtā ||17 ||
SA10n1069:322: atra ca idaṃ vicāryate - ya eṣa prathamo bhavaḥ phalarūpatvena vyavasthāpyate,
SA10n1069:323: sa kiṃ carame bhave niruddhe upajāyate,
SA10n1069:327: sarvathā ca vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavatīti pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1069:328: carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ |
SA10n1069:329: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ ||18 ||
SA10n1069:330: tatra yadi carame bhave niruddhe prathamo bhavo jāyate iti parikalpyate,
SA10n1069:334: tasmāccarame niruddhe prathamo bhavo na yujyate ||
SA10n1069:335: idānīmaniruddhe'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo na yujyate |
SA10n1069:342: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ |
SA10n1069:344: idānīṃ nirudhyamāne'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1069:354: jāyamānaścāpara iti yaugapadyenaiva dvau bhavau prāpnutaḥ |
SA10n1069:355: na caikasya yugapad dvau bhavau saṃbhavataḥ ityuktametat ||19 ||
SA10n1069:358: sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate ||20 ||
SA10n1069:361: yadā evaṃ yathoditanyāyena niruddhe carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1069:362: aniruddhe'pi carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1069:363: sārdhaṃ caikasmiśca kāle caramena bhavena saha prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1069:364: tat kimidānīṃ yeṣu eva skandheṣu mriyate teṣu eva jāyate iti syāt |
SA10n1069:367: na hi mriyamāṇo jāyate iti dṛṣṭam ||20 ||
SA10n1069:372: carame bhave niruddhe'niruddhe nirudhyamāne yasmāt prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1069:374: triṣu kāleṣu yā nāsti sā kathaṃ bhavasaṃtatiḥ ||21 ||
SA10n1069:375: yā ca idānīṃ triṣu kāleṣu nāsti,
SA10n1069:376: kutaḥ sā anyenātmanā bhaviṣyatīti sarvathā nāsti bhavanmatā bhavasaṃtatiḥ |
SA10n1069:380: tataśca bhāvābhyupagame sati sa eva śāśvatocchedavādaprasaṅgo durnivāro bhavatām,
SA10n1069:381: ityato nāstyeva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvata utpattiriti siddham |
SA10n1069:385: na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro |
SA10n1069:386: na ca anyu tato na caiva ta -
SA10n1069:390: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato
SA10n1069:396: jāyate cyavate cāpi na ca jātirna ca cyutiḥ |
SA10n1069:412: so'pi ca cittu na jātu na bhūtaḥ |
